item.description:
I have known many women, myself included, who have complicated relationships with our mothers,  forever impacting how we feel about ourselves.

Ruth Reichl has written a wonderful book, "For You Mom, Finally", a homage to her mother.  So often we fail to see our mothers as a product of their own circumstances, and fail to appreciate all that they have done to give us a better life.

Check the book out and let's discuss our mother's and our complicated relationships with them.  Please read the book, it is a short, easy read.
item.name: Book Discussion: For You Mom, Finally - by Ruth Reichl
